books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A classic American novel set in the Jazz Age that tells the tragic story of Jay Gatsby and his unrequited love for Daisy Buchanan.

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A gripping tale of racial injustice and childhood innocence in the American South during the 1930s.

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian social science fiction novel about totalitarian control and the struggle for truth and freedom.

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A romantic novel that explores the themes of love, marriage, and social class in Georgian England.

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.author: J.D. Salinger
books.description: A controversial novel following teenager Holden Caulfield's experiences in New York City after being expelled from prep school.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: The first book in the beloved Harry Potter series, following a young wizard's journey at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

books.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: The first volume of the epic fantasy trilogy following Frodo Baggins and his quest to destroy the One Ring.

books.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
books.author: Douglas Adams
books.description: A comedic science fiction series following Arthur Dent's adventures through space after Earth's destruction.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: An epic science fiction novel set in a distant future where interstellar travel and political intrigue shape the universe.

books.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
books.author: Stieg Larsson
books.description: A psychological thriller combining murder mystery, family saga, and financial intrigue in Sweden.

books.title: The Alchemist
books.author: Paulo Coelho
books.description: A philosophical novel about a shepherd boy's journey to find treasure and discover his personal legend.

books.title: The Da Vinci Code
books.author: Dan Brown
books.description: A mystery thriller following symbologist Robert Langdon as he investigates a murder connected to the Holy Grail.

books.title: The Hunger Games
books.author: Suzanne Collins
books.description: A dystopian novel set in a post-apocalyptic world where teenagers are forced to fight to the death in a televised competition.

books.title: Gone Girl
books.author: Gillian Flynn
books.description: A psychological thriller about a marriage gone terribly wrong when a wife disappears on her fifth wedding anniversary.

books.title: The Fault in Our Stars
books.author: John Green
books.description: A heart-wrenching love story between two teenagers who meet in a cancer support group.

books.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
books.author: Delia Owens
books.description: A mystery and coming-of-age story set in the marshlands of North Carolina about a girl who raised herself in isolation.

books.title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
books.author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
books.description: A reclusive Hollywood icon finally tells her life story to a young journalist, revealing shocking secrets about her seven marriages.

books.title: Educated
books.author: Tara Westover
books.description: A powerful memoir about a woman who grows up in a survivalist family and eventually pursues education despite her family's objections.

books.title: Becoming
books.author: Michelle Obama
books.description: The intimate and inspiring memoir of former First Lady Michelle Obama, chronicling her journey from childhood to the White House.

books.title: The Silent Patient
books.author: Alex Michaelides
books.description: A woman refuses to speak after allegedly murdering her husband, and a psychotherapist becomes obsessed with treating her.
